Text:
(...Hmm. This town is really...plain. So plain that I can't
think of any other word for it.)

(And so far, that bird guy, the femboy, and that
sketchy lady are the only people who stand out.)

(Heh... Sounds like a pretty good place to live as a
background character, huh?)

(All I need to do now is stick to the shadows and
look for a way out, occasionally assisted by those
main characters, but never getting too close...)

(There it is! The ultimate solution to this place...
the ultimate side character life!)
BOSS MAN!!!
Hm? That sounds like... Nah, no way Delta's here.

Hey, he really was that NPC from before!
You should've said something sooner!

Anyways, we're gonna be working together from
now on, so nice to meet ya!

Wow, you certainly did pull of the "nobody important"
act well... Oh, but I don't mean that in a bad way.
...Explain.

Forgive me, Cid. I enlisted their help to get us out
of this situation.

Still, I'm truly glad to see you unharmed. Please
don't do anything else reckless.
...Oh really. Huh.
(It's over... Goodbye, perfect side character life!)
Now if we can cut this heartwarming reunion short...
(My heart isn't even a degree warmer.)

I'd like to go over the details one more time.
Have you noticed anything strange?

Hmm, not really. That goes for the town, too.
The very picture of mundane.

You're asking the wrong question. Of course he's
gonna say there wasn't anything weird.

Tell us everything from the start—what you've done
since getting here, what you saw...

Well, I put on the artifact...and then next thing I
knew, I was in the forest. There was this rusty old
armored warrior, and then—

S-Stop right there! I just heard a very important
word!
Wait a sec, by "armored warrior", do you mean...?!
...Wethermon the Tombguard.

Wait, but we defeated him, right? I REALLY hope this
is a case of mistaken identity.
You seem to have some connection to this "Wethermon".

Connection... Yeah, I guess you could say that. He's
a monster the three of us took out together.

That reminds me, Delta, didn't you say you smelled
and heard something metallic in the forest?
Yeah! Maybe it's the guy you're talking about?
Yeah. But why on earth would he be here...?

We beat Wethermon, no questioning that. So this one
may be unused or leftover data...basically not the
original.

(Smelling him is one thing, but if Delta heard him,
would that mean he's moving around? He was completely
immobile, last I saw.)
Anyway, that's not our question to answer. But—

He, Wethermon, might be the key to getting home. As
hardcore gamers, we gotta check it out.

*sigh* Just like a unique event. So our initial
reason for coming here was correct.

I'm not sure I understand everything, but can I
assume beating that armored guy is our ticket home?

You say that like it's gonna be easy. Us winning a
rematch against that thing is pretty laughable, okay?

Yeah, because we barely won the first time, and at
a massive cost to us all three of us.

So it was only the three of you. Wouldn't that mean
our chances are better this time around?
I mean, there are six of us—
Five of us. And I'm sure we'll be fine.

(Hold up... Uh, Alpha? You aren't trying to leave me
out of the action again, are you?)

You demonstrated your strength to us earlier. If
Delta and I join you, I'm fairly certain we can
overcome even the toughest of foes.

I could do it by myself! So you just stay back,
female male guy!
Hmph, well, somebody's got a mouth...
...We'll be fine, Cid. No need to trouble yourself.
(I knew it! She's trying to exclude me!)

But yeah, if you can't move that well, you'll only
get insta-killed. So, it looks like it's just going
be the five of us.
...Is that what you really think?
About what?
Do you really think it's going to be five on one?!
...Oh yeah, that's right.

If he summons Kirin, then it'll be five on two...
I totally forgot.
That's because you leave everything to me.
Hey, that's just division of labor.

(Wh-What the hell...?! I'm fine with being treated
like a side character, but to be completely
brushed aside like this...)

So, you surmised that our target has a companion...
Impressive as ever, Cid.

I'd like for the three of you to tell us everything
you know about Wethermon and Kirin. Then Pencilgon
and I will devise a strategy.
You got it!

...Sure looks like they're having fun stategizing.
And all without a single thought for me!
Boss man!

My only friend is Delta, who wouldn't understand the
meeting anyway... Good girl...
Ehehe! Delta's on your side!

(Not that I'm gonna roll over and take it so easy,
though!)

(They'll never know it, but I'm going with them on
the Wethermon hunt! Count on it!)
